entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:38 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 41 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -19.9°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
